statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_path FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%avatar%';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' OR asset_type = 'armor'
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM game_assets WHERE asset_size > 1000 ORDER BY asset_size ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT asset_name, asset_path FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT AVG(asset_size) AS average_size FROM game_assets
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE texture_id = 1;
SELECT texture_name, file_path FROM textures WHERE texture_name = 'wood';
SELECT * FROM models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM models WHERE model_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM textures JOIN models ON textures.texture_id = models.model_id;
SELECT texture_name, file_path FROM textures WHERE texture_id = 1;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM models WHERE model_id > 5 ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT file_path FROM textures WHERE texture_name LIKE 'wood%' AND file_path LIKE '%.jpg';
SELECT texture_id, texture_name, file_path FROM textures, models WHERE textures.texture_name = models.model_name;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE file_path IN ('path1.png', 'path2.png', 'path3.png');
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE texture_name = 'Wood Texture';
SELECT texture_id, texture_name FROM textures ORDER BY texture_name DESC;
SELECT texture_name, LENGTH(texture_file) AS file_size FROM textures WHERE texture_id = 'd9bf9034-02a2-4b8b-ad88-599b0a2d574e';
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM models WHERE model_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT sound_name, sound_file FROM sound_files WHERE sound_id = '3b691504-0654-44aa-9356-4504d1c3643b';
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE texture_id = '54db3b12-941d-4cfa-b2c3-0cb4ec4e4cb6';
SELECT * FROM models WHERE model_name LIKE '%chair%' ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT texture_name, LENGTH(texture_file) AS file_size FROM textures WHERE LENGTH(texture_file) > 1024;
SELECT model_name, model_file FROM models WHERE model_name = 'table' OR model_id = '8e2287d5-8182-4809-b46f-5c6d8c8d6b6f';
SELECT * FROM sound_files WHERE sound_name = 'background_music' ORDER BY sound_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE size_in_kb > 100
SELECT id, texture_name FROM textures
SELECT model_name, vertices, faces FROM models WHERE faces > 500
SELECT sound_name, format FROM sound_files WHERE length_in_seconds < 30
SELECT asset_name, type, file_path FROM game_assets WHERE type = 'sound'
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE size_in_kb > 1000 ORDER BY texture_name ASC;
SELECT model_name, vertices, faces FROM models WHERE vertices > 5000 ORDER BY faces DESC;
SELECT sound_name, format, length_in_seconds FROM sound_files WHERE format = 'mp3' AND length_in_seconds > 30 ORDER BY sound_name;
SELECT asset_name, type, file_path FROM game_assets WHERE type = 'animation' AND file_path LIKE '%.gif%' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, vertices, faces FROM models WHERE vertices > 2000 OR faces < 500 ORDER BY model_name ASC, vertices DESC;
SELECT name, file_path FROM textures;
SELECT id, name, file_path, size_in_MB FROM textures WHERE size_in_MB > 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_path FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Texture';
SELECT * FROM sound_files ORDER BY duration_seconds DESC;
SELECT id, name, polygons_count FROM models WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE size_in_MB > 100
SELECT name, file_path FROM models ORDER BY polygons_count DESC
SELECT sound_files.name, sound_files.duration_seconds FROM sound_files WHERE duration_seconds < 10
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'texture'
SELECT textures.name, models.name, game_assets.asset_name FROM textures JOIN models ON textures.id = models.id JOIN game_assets ON models.id = game_assets.id
